name: Scentbird, Inc.
description: Operator of a subscription-based perfume retail platform intended to revolutionize the way people shop for fragrances. The company's platform provides different types of fragrances through an online platform that is tailor-made for both men and women, enabling consumers to access a wide range of scents at affordable rates.
one_liner: Operator of a subscription-based perfume retail platform intended to revolutionize the way people shop for fragrances. The company's platform provides different types of fragrances through an online platform that is tailor-made for both men and women, enabling consumers to access a wide range of scents at affordable rates.
